cities.name: Calgary
cities.description: Calgary is a vibrant city in Alberta, Canada, known for its rodeo events and rich cultural scene.

cities.name: Edmonton
cities.description: Edmonton is the capital city of Alberta, Canada, known for its beautiful river valley, festivals, and historic sites.

cities.name: Banff
cities.description: Banff is a picturesque town located in Alberta's Rocky Mountains, famous for its stunning natural scenery and outdoor activities.

cities.name: Vancouver
cities.description: Vancouver is a coastal city in British Columbia, known for its beautiful parks and outdoor activities.
colleges: Emily Carr University of Art + Design

cities.name: Victoria
cities.description: Victoria is the capital city of British Columbia, situated on Vancouver Island, known for its historic architecture and beautiful gardens.

cities.name: Whistler
cities.description: Whistler is a resort town in British Columbia, famous for its ski slopes, outdoor adventures, and vibrant village atmosphere.

cities.name: Winnipeg
cities.description: Winnipeg is the capital city of Manitoba, Canada, known for its beautiful river valley, festivals, and historic sites.

cities.name: Brandon
cities.description: Brandon is a city in Manitoba, Canada, known for its vibrant community and cultural events. It is often referred to as the 'Wheat City' due to its rich agricultural history.

cities.name: Steinbach
cities.description: Steinbach is a city in southeastern Manitoba, Canada, known for its thriving community, cultural diversity, and strong Mennonite heritage.

cities.name: Fredericton
cities.description: Fredericton is the capital city of New Brunswick, Canada, known for its rich history, beautiful riverside setting, and vibrant cultural scene.

cities.name: Saint John
cities.description: Saint John is a city in New Brunswick, Canada, known for its historic charm, beautiful waterfront, and maritime heritage. It's the largest city in New Brunswick.
colleges: University of New Brunswick - Saint John

cities.name: Moncton
cities.description: Moncton is a city in New Brunswick, Canada, known for its bilingual culture, vibrant arts scene, and economic development. It's one of the fastest-growing cities in the country.

cities.name: St. John's
cities.description: St. John's is the capital city of Newfoundland and Labrador, Canada, known for its stunning coastal scenery, colorful row houses, and rich cultural heritage.

cities.name: Corner Brook
cities.description: Corner Brook is a city in Newfoundland and Labrador, Canada, known for its beautiful location on the Bay of Islands, outdoor recreational opportunities, and cultural events.

cities.name: Mount Pearl
cities.description: Mount Pearl is a city in Newfoundland and Labrador, Canada, known for its suburban charm, parks, and proximity to St. John's, the provincial capital.

cities.name: Halifax
cities.description: Halifax is the capital city of Nova Scotia, Canada, known for its stunning coastal scenery, historic architecture, and vibrant cultural scene.

cities.name: Dartmouth
cities.description: Dartmouth is a city in Nova Scotia, Canada, located on the eastern shore of Halifax Harbour. It is known for its waterfront views, parks, and proximity to Halifax.

cities.name: Sydney
cities.description: Sydney is a city in Nova Scotia, Canada, known for its industrial heritage, beautiful waterfront, and cultural events. It's located on Cape Breton Island.

cities.name: Toronto
cities.description: Toronto is the capital of Ontario and Canada's largest city, famous for its cultural diversity and economic importance.

cities.name: Ottawa
cities.description: Ottawa is the capital city of Canada, known for its historic landmarks, government institutions, and cultural festivals.

cities.name: Niagara Falls
cities.description: Niagara Falls is a popular tourist destination in Ontario, famous for its spectacular waterfalls, entertainment, and scenic views.

cities.name: Charlottetown
cities.description: Charlottetown is the capital city of Prince Edward Island, Canada, known for its historic charm, beautiful beaches, and as the birthplace of Confederation.

cities.name: Summerside
cities.description: Summerside is a city in Prince Edward Island, Canada, known for its beautiful shoreline, parks, and as a hub for aerospace and information technology industries.

cities.name: Stratford
cities.description: Stratford is a town in Prince Edward Island, Canada, located just across the Hillsborough River from Charlottetown. It offers a peaceful and suburban lifestyle with proximity to the provincial capital.

cities.name: Quebec City
cities.description: Quebec City is the capital of the province of Quebec, Canada, known for its rich history, French heritage, and stunning architecture. It's one of the oldest cities in North America.

cities.name: Montreal
cities.description: Montreal is the largest city in the province of Quebec, Canada, known for its vibrant multicultural scene, historic architecture, and thriving arts and culture.

cities.name: Laval
cities.description: Laval is a city in Quebec, Canada, located just north of Montreal. It is known for its diverse communities, cultural events, and recreational opportunities.

cities.name: Regina
cities.description: Regina is the capital city of Saskatchewan, Canada, known for its cultural events, historic architecture, and as the home of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police training academy.

cities.name: Saskatoon
cities.description: Saskatoon is a city in Saskatchewan, Canada, known for its beautiful riverfront, cultural diversity, and thriving arts and music scene.

cities.name: Prince Albert
cities.description: Prince Albert is a city in Saskatchewan, Canada, known for its natural beauty, outdoor recreation, and as the 'Gateway to the North' due to its location in northern Saskatchewan.
